attributes.action: The abolition of of discrimination towards Left Handed people.
attributes.additional_details:
Please raise awareness about the minority discrimination of language against those who are left handed.
Right is derogative for left handed people.
Like Color Blindness, all I'm asking is an alternative.
Like Mind Maps, all I'm asking is an alternative.

To live and work in an environment that isn't full of discrimination.
To have the freedom of expression.
Maybe you could tell the Oxford Dictionary to put some modern, fairer terms to balance it out, or remove some of the positives for the word right so the more technical word can be used. Discrimination is laziness. Please respect this petition.
